name: Kinky Squirrel.beta v.0.1
description:
Kinky Squrrel is a R-18 NSFW furry sex game where you play in a POV perspective. This is a Glooshy Games first but also in it's demo beta stage.

                                                                                    Gameplay

Experience the game through first person well have sex with a Kinky Squrrel in various outfit , headwear and skins.

                           (NOTE: NOT ALL  ITEMS  ARE IN THE DEMO VERSION)

                                                                                 CONTROLS:

  • Mouse - Your left click interacts with buttons in game 
                      and holding your right click to move your view.
  • F-key -  Puts a fake message coveing game screen. Then press F again to return game.
        (ALWAYS  TEST  SCREEN  BEFORE  STARTING  ON  SLOWER  COMPUTERS)
  • Escape - Immediately closes game
